WorkItem.Description:
Hello,

I am working on a project using .Net technologies. In our peoject, we are using Entity Framework/Linq/Automapper/POCO.

We use below functions of Automapper as - 
1. Automapper.CreateMap() - to declare maps.
2. Automapper.Mapper.Map() - to map source to destination type (i.e. Data Access object to POCO entities).

But, somehow Automapper is giving performance hit to some extent. So, I was trying to figure out am I making correct use of the plug in?

It would be great if I could get valuable help from anyone who has worked/studied about this plug-in.

Thanks in advance!
